name: Mindful Investors
overview:
Mindful Investors is an investment partnership focused exclusively on opportunities in the rapidly growing natural, organic and sustainable consumer products market. They target companies with an enterprise value of $10 million to $100 million and invest in management teams that are passionate about their core values and are committed to taking their company to the next level of success.

The Mindful Investors’ general partner team has spent their careers investing in, developing and managing health and wellness related companies. They have also assembled a Board of organic industry specific Advisors and Operating Managers who offer significant strategic and tactical advice to our portfolio companies.

As a portfolio company, you and your team will have access to a solid team of professionals who are passionate and experienced in the green and sustainable markets and can help you realize your corporate vision while staying true to your dedication to having a positive impact on people’s health and the health of our planet.
